detail_desc: Jacket in soft pile with a hood. Contrasting colour jersey lining and sewn-on ears. Zip down the front with a chin guard.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton chambray with a narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke and darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress woven in an organic cotton blend containing some linen with buttons at the back. Seam at the top and a flared skirt with patch front pockets. Unlined.
Glittery skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a glittery elastic waistband and a tulle lining.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Rugby shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a woven collar and concealed button placket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, visible seams at the front and a small embroidery detail at the top.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and gently tapered legs.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Skirt in lightweight, patterned stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, decorative buttons down the front, and fake front pockets.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wavy, overlocked edges and a wide elasticated hem with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Short running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and soft mesh inner shorts with a key pocket.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in soft cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. One patterned and one in a solid colour.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered motif at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Windproof running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Hood, zip down the front, ribbed cuffs with thumbholes, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. Tight Fit.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a round neckline and knot-shaped metal buttons down the front. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and corduroy patches on the knees. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless. straight-cut top in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the hem.

Knee-length, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie detail at one side. Long sleeves and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Set with three pairs of metal hoop earrings and three pairs of studs in various designs. Diameter of earrings 4.5 cm, 7 cm and 9 cm. Diameter of studs approx. 0.5 cm.
Straight-cut top in sweatshirt fabric with long balloon sleeves in tulle with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hand chain in the shape of a skeleton with a bracelet and five links that go over the back of the hand and fingers and are held in place by rings. Adjustable length, 19-23 cm.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar, smocked yoke and long, wide sleeves with smocked cuffs. Seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Wide blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey.
Cropped top in stretch jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waistband in sturdier fabric and a high cut at the back.
Blouse in airy, softly draping silk with a V-neck, long dolman sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square neckline, corset lacing at the front, long sleeves and frill trims at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Denim shirt with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Coat in soft felted fabric with a faux fur-lined collar and faux fur trim at the cuffs. Covered buttons at the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a soft, lightly napped finish. Side pockets, flap back pockets and wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Cotton twill trousers with a button fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular fit.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a shawl collar, long sleeves and no buttons.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Detachable, adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with hole-knit details at the front, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket, hood with embroidery and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gloves in soft imitation leather with elastication at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and ribbed hems. Legs with reversible sequin side stripes (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y).
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative flatlock seams.
Long-sleeved top in soft, sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft bikini top with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Stylish oval earrings in shiny, gold-plated metal.
Wide blouse in an airy, viscose weave with a large, voluminous collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, long, wide sleeves with ties and a double flounce at the cuffs.
Yoga socks in jersey with mesh fronts and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.

Ankle-length jumpsuit woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck at the back, and twisted rope shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back, a low crotch and side pockets. Pleats at the waist and straight, softly draping legs. Lined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Tapered legs with open pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Short jersey dress in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Small handbag made from plastic beads sewn together by hand. Two handles and a concealed press-stud at the top, a narrow, detachable, metal shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 18x26 cm.
